TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void PingCompletedEventHandler(object sender, PingCompletedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed PingCompletedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub PingCompletedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As PingCompletedEventArgs)
public delegate void PingCompletedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, PingCompletedEventArgs ^ e);
type PingCompletedEventHandler = delegate of obj * PingCompletedEventArgs -> unit

Docs.param: 包含事件数据的 对象。
Docs.summary: 表示将处理 对象的 事件的方法。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A> 调用中指定的用户数据可用于此委托在 <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.UserState%2A> 属性中调用的方法。
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何指定 <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventHandler> 来响应 <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.PingCompleted> 事件。
[!code-cpp[NclPingAsync#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclPingAsync/CPP/asyncping.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[NclPingAsync#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclPingAsync/CS/asyncping.cs#1)]
